Featuring fantastic graphics and sound, and super fast gameplay, Sports Superbike hear-stopping race to the checkered flag.

155558.name: Save the Date

videogamehonor.32088: 2014 IGF Awards (Nuovo) Best Innovation of the Year Nominee

155558.description:
User Summary

Save the Date is a visual novel style game in which you have one goal: save your date from certain death.

A game about life, storytelling, and our relationship with games. The game is available for free on the developer's website: http://paperdino.com/save-the-date/

155559.name: Icarus Proudbottom Teaches Typing
155559.description:
User Summary

Icarus Proudbottom and his spirit animal companion, a talking Owl, take you on an adventure involving magic, heroism, government conspiracy, and above all: typing.

Originally made in 30 days for the Something Awful GameDev Competition VIII, which had the theme of "subversive edutainment."

155560.name: Sports Superbike 2
155560.description:
From the back of the North American PlayStation case:

Sports Superbike 2 - Heart Pounding Excitement

Sports Superbike 2 tops the original with more awesome superbikes to choose from in this adrenaline packed racing game.


Enter races with over 20 competitors.
Race on varied and incredibly realistic tracks.
Custom tailor your bike for maximum performance.
More Superbikes! More Competitors! More Tracks!

155561.name: Choose Your Crew: Pirates
155561.description: Yaar! Anchors up! Here’s an exciting new card game that’s simple to learn and fun to play! Gather your crew of dastardly pirates to set sail before your opponents and win the game! Along the way you can sabotage their efforts with cannon fire, a bout of scurvy or incite mutiny in their midst! Convince more pirates to join your crew with spiced rum and treasure. Or even kidnap a crew member from a rival ship! If you have an abundance of Swabbies mopping the decks but not enough Gunners to man the cannons you can trade them across to a rival crew for someone more worthy of your ship. But beware you might not always get what you bargain for. After all, pirates are a deceitful lot!

155562.description:
An 8 card promo expansion for BabeQuest, given out for free at Viking-Con 22 in 2003.

The expansion consist of 8 cards:
Hunting Ground: Viking-Con
Move: Smuglervodka (Smuggler Booze)
H: Arrangør (Organizor)
Babe: Elverpigen (The Elven Chick)
Move: Scoresætning (Pick-up Line)
H/U: Indre Mission (Religious Group)
Countermove: Magic-nørder (Magic Nerds)
Gear: Guldterninger (Gold Dice)

Apart from adding more variety, these cards do not change the way the game is played.
155562.name: BabeQuest: Viking-Con Special Edition

155563.name: Maelstrom Domesday Herb Cards
155563.description:
From the top card of the deck:

These cards replicate the herb information given in the core book and are intended to speed up play by providing easily consulted details.

It should be remembered that Maelstrom Domesday is a game, and the information given on these cards is for game purposes only. Under no circumstances should it be used as medical information.

User Description:

A pack of 100 colour Herb reference cards containing a description and all game data.

155564.name: QuizClash
155564.description:
User Summary

The game is played by two players against each other. The players have give the correct answers to more question as their chosen or random opponent. The questions are out of 19 categories like as for example: "TV series", "Computer games", "Around the world" and many more.

155565.name: Rageball
155565.description:
From the back of the North American PlayStation case:

Rageball is a brutally played sport of the future, pitting teams of exiled human convicts against each other in a battle for victory. The Colony hosts Rageball in events that are broadcast worldwide. This is a game where sportsmanship means nothing and where hesitation usually means a quick end to your player.

Take the role of manager of a low ranking Rageball team, coaching your players and placing bets on the road to victory. Can you handle the pain of the game?

155566.name: Beatbuddy: Tale of the Guardians

videogamehonor.32145: 2012 IGF Awards Excellence In Audio Nominee

155566.description:
Beatbuddy is a hand-drawn arcade game with unique music interaction. You're leading the mystical creature Beatbuddy on his adventure against Prince Maestro's army to save your beloved musical homeland Symphonia. As you bounce off bassdrum catapults and snare-jump with the Bubblebuggy whole songs unfold in each of the six worlds. The exclusive music is composed by artists like Austin Wintory, Sabrepulse and Parov Stelar.

Source: The Game Website.

155567.name: Starseed Pilgrim

videogamehonor.32086: 2013 IGF Awards (Nuovo) Best Innovation of the Year Nominee

155567.description:
"Starseed Pilgrim is a game about tending a symphonic garden, exploring space, and embracing fate."

You are a gardener, tending to empty noise and empty space to fill them both with colour. You are a refugee, building your own world away from the spreading darkness. You are an explorer, discovering new places, new rules, and new fascinations. The universe is bigger than you know.

Source: The Game Website.

155568.name: Rascal Racers
155568.description:
Rascal Racers !

Eight wild animal characters are waiting for you to jump in the driver's seat. Choose to guide Argyle the Aardvark, Paulie the Beaver or one of their friends across nine treacherous courses split over three locations. Your goal ? That's easy, to win all nine races in the RASCAL RACERS tournament of course ! Use missiles, force fields and grenades to put a stop to your opposition. Only the craziest drivers will have what it takes !

Source: The Developer Website.

155569.name: Star Wars: Battlefront (2015)

videogamehonor.31504: 2015 Game Critics Best Action Game of the Year Winner

155569.description:
Star Wars: Battlefront is an upcoming video game in the Star Wars: Battlefront series, under development by DICE. The game was introduced at Electronic Arts' E3 press conference on June 10, 2013. While no release date has been announced, at EA's annual meeting of stockholders chief financial officer Blake Jorgensen indicated that the game would be released in the Q2/Q3 of 2015, which correlates to when Star Wars Episode VII is expected to be released.

Source: Wikipedia, "Star Wars: Battlefront (2015 video game)", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

155570.name: Wrath of the Orc Lord
155570.description:
From the Introduction

The adventurers are hired (or convinced via threats) to kill a rogue orc general. They track the general’s army to their camp but realize that they can’t do the job with the army around their target. They set out for a nearby castle (braving unnatural weather on the way) and capture it. The rogue general brings her orc army to the castle, and there is a huge battle. The adventurers use the chaos of the battle to get close enough to their target to attack the rogue general.

This is the first of three interlinked adventures: Wrath of the Orc Lord, Domain of the Dwarf King, and The Elf Queen’s Enchantment. These three adventures form The Orc War Trilogy. Trilogy normally indicates sequential action, but these adventures take place simultaneously and cumulate in a fight against the same foe. As such the end of this adventure might not see these characters ‘winning’, instead they set up the fight for next adventure, and it is finally won by the characters in the final adventure.

155571.name: Busty Barbarian Bimbos
155571.description:
From the back of the book

Looking for a hard-edged gritty roleplaying experience? Looking to explore deep and nuanced facets of the human experience? Looking for a crunch, detailed rules lexicon to facilitate a fantasy world simulation. Keep looking.

Busty Barbarian Bimbos puts the players in the position of the exact kind of character that is all too often represented in gaming artwork, but rarely present in the rules; the sexy sword-bunny hell0bent on scoring some coins, couture and camaraderie.

Featuring simple intuitive rules.

Streamlined character creation to get started quickly.

Garment, equipment, and outfit creation table to kickstart your wardrobe.

Dozens of adventure seeds to keep the action moving.

Require three six-sided dice and a juvenile sense of humor to play.

155572.name: The Evil Within

videogamehonor.30788: 2014 Gamescom Best PC Game of the Year Nominee

155572.description:
The Evil Within is an upcoming survival horror video game, being developed by Japanese studio Tango Gameworks and published by Bethesda Softworks for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4, Xbox 360 and Xbox One.

Source: Wikipedia, "The Evil Within", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

155573.name: Reiner Knizia's Razzia - The Mafia Board Game
155573.description:
Razzia is a bidding card game. Each player represents the head of a crime family. Using your cheques get as much cards symbolizing various interests for the mafia as possible via the auction, and beware of the police who will try to thwart those plans by all means necessary.

A bidding game based on strategy and random events. Razzia is a well known and loved title throughout the world, it's his first touch screen device adaption.

Source: The Developer Website.

155574.name: Hill Giant Hall
155574.description:
From the introduction:

This is a "poor gamer's adventure" to help anyone looking for material to use. The premise of the adventure is not new and has already been rehashed by others: put a group of high level characters through a series of battles against various types of giants.

155575.description: BattleLore (Second Edition) – Dice Pack contains eight attack dice for BattleLore (Second Edition), giving players more dice on hand to keep battles moving.
155575.name: BattleLore (Second Edition): Dice Pack

155576.description:
Game description from the publisher:

Advance your claim to the Iron Throne with Ancestral Home, the fourth Chapter Pack in the "Conquest and Defiance" cycle for A Game of Thrones: The Card Game!

Introducing sixty new cards (three copies each of twenty different cards), this Chapter Pack continues to support the Prized keyword, alongside the cycle's themes of multi-House decks and Neutral Faction decks. Whether you set sail with House Greyjoy, support the Prince of Dorne, or lend your strength to another Great House, you'll find plenty to enjoy in this expansion.
155576.name: A Game of Thrones: The Card Game – Ancestral Home

39953.name: A Game of Thrones: The Card Game

155577.description:
Jungle Speed: 20 Years is a special edition of Jungle Speed designed to celebrate the games's twentieth anniversary.

Gameplay remains the same as always: Shuffle the cards and deal them out as evenly as possible among all players. Set the totem in the middle of the playing area. Players take turns flipping one card at a time from their personal deck onto a personal discard deck. If two face-up cards show the same symbol, the players of those cards race to grab the totem, with the first grabber giving his stack of face-up cards to the slowpoke. Special cards mix up who should be grabbing what when to keep players on their toes. Whoever runs out of cards first wins!

Jungle Speed: 20 Years comes packaged in a special golden case with a golden-backed version of the original card deck as well as a new card deck and a wooden totem.
155577.name: Jungle Speed: 20 Years

155578.name: Caravan of Dreams
155578.description:
user summary

Tiny Epic: Caravan of Dreams is an expansion deck that adds 44 new cards to the game and revises 5 cards in the original deck.

The expansion contains 12 new Avatars, 8 new Professions, and 25 new Legends.

155580.description:
Find pirate’s treasure! We have gathered in a desert island of wrecked pirate ship to find treasure. To take more gold and treasure each other in frantic, pirates still remain on the island. Who could take the treasure most avoiding pirates? Good Luck~!

[Goal]
To get the most treasure tokens.

[Game Play]
The game contains 48 Gold cards, 4 Pirate cards and 1 Treasure Box card. In your turn, draw a card from top of the deck and give it to any player(including you). Rules to give a card are as follow.
1. You can give a card up to 7 times. (In case of 6~7 players, up to 5 times.)
2. Do not look a card when draw. Choose a player and then open a card in front of him/her. You can also choose yourself and open in front of you.
3. Give cards to at least 3 people including you before your turn ends. You can give to more than 3 people, but you should be included.
If a special card(Pirate or Treasure Box) appears during you are giving cards, your turn ends immediately. Pirate takes your treasure token and Treasure Box gives you the tokens taken.

[Game Ends]
The round ends when 4 pieces apper among the 5 special cards, and the player who has the most Golds gets treasure tokens. The game ends after 3 rounds.
Compare each other's treasure tokens, and decide the winner.
155580.name: Good Luck

155581.description:
The stars have not been seen in the night sky for some time. Hereupon brave explorers sought the stars disappeared. You need to compete with other explorers and seek more constellations than them. Let’s go to seek quickly~ But, be careful not to collide with other spaceships!

[Goal]
Gather as many constellation cards as you can. The player who gets highest score wins.

[Game Play]
ASRUS: Zodiac is a ‘simultaneous action’ game, so there is no order to play. In each turn, every players play a card from hands. You should play face down not to show to others. After all players have played, open the cards at the same time.
1. Make the closest distance!
Only one player can get stars(cards = points). For this, you need to approach to the destination as close as possible. Basically who makes the closest distance will get stars - ‘Distance’ means the
gap(absolute value) between the number of your card and the destination.
2. Avoid collisions!
But notice, you should avoid the collision with other spaceships! Even though the closest distance, if several players have made same distances, they all collide.

[Game Ends & Scoring]
After several turns, when you used up all cards in hands, the game ends. Scoring is as below, and the player who gets highest score wins.
1. 1 point per a constellation card you acquired.

+ 1 bonus point per a set of 4 colors (red, blue, green, and brown)

2. 2 points to the player who has the most energy (if tie, 1 point to each.)
3. Bonus points to the player who has the great explorer prize
But! The player whose spaceship has no energy cannot return from the exploration. 0 points!


This game is second edition of ASRUS, it has the same basic system with ASRUS but there are spaceships and no glass stones - a little more strategic.
155581.name: Asrus: Zodiac

155582.description:
In ERA, you will lead 1 of 4 special historical groups on the brink of greatness or devastation. Using only the leaders, inventions, and technology of that fragile time period, you must successfully unfold the events that made that nation or culture forever remembered in history.

ERA is a 2-4 player strategy card game that features a unique, 3-pile card management system to let you build, expand, and defend your unique historical group. ERA is also a symbols-only, no-text game system that provides a massive amount of information-at-a-glance for quick and effective gameplay.

The first player to score 15 progress points or deal 3 devastation markers to his opponent, wins.

Other exciting elements of ERA:

An incredible story in every deck. Each deck in ERA is packed with a powerful story of survival, innovation, or courage.
innovative "switch" conflict system. Each ERA deck contains conflict cards that represent your era’s weaknesses or dangers (disease, invaders, etc.) These cards are given to your opponent, and they give you theirs. These cards are then shuffled into your decks for you to play against each other.
See history actually unfold before your eyes. ERA’s unique “unlock” system allows you relive the progression of historical events as they really happened, while still allowing a vast amount of strategy and replayability.
Conflict in ERA isn’t limited to military battles. You can drown a Spanish Galleon in raging seas, cause the Apollo rocket to malfunction, or unleash the Bubonic plague against Europe!
155582.name: ERA

155583.description:
Adaptation of Monopoly as players travel through Houston, TX buying, selling, and trading local landmarks such as the Galleria, Pappadeaux, and the Houston Chronicle.

Objective: To become the wealthiest resident of Houston by buying, operating, and selling local businesses. Force all other players to go out of business and you are the winner!
155583.name: HoustonOpoly

155584.description:
King's Pouch is pouch-building strategy game set in a medieval kingdom. Each round offers tough choices on how to expand your pool of citizens and buildings. Using the resources you acquire, you may raise powerful armies or secure the support of powerful characters.

Will you be a peaceful protector of the royal family? Or maybe a warlord, taking what he wants by force? Or will you make a wrong step and fail to write your name in the annals of history? Take up the King's Pouch and find out!
155584.name: King's Pouch

155585.description:
After global nuclear war, the earth covered with thick nuclear dust couldn't be ideal for human or any life, and the situation become worse every year in spite of many efforts to recover it by survivors. The chosen scientists group of global survivors on the earth had ambitious plan to manage a big city to float in the sky above the nuclear dusted cloud. Eventually one city was successfully floated in the sky after many trial and errors, by new technology about utilizing nuclear energy and earth's magnetic field. That city was named as 'LAPUTA', according to the name of the project...

[Object]
On the game board, LAPUTA which consists of 7 areas is floated on the sky. The Sky is devided as 3 regions to defend LAPUTA efficiently. Players have to defeat the rebel fleet and protect LAPUTA. Distinguish yourself in battle and rise to the next Admiral.

[Game Play]
The game consists of 8 rounds, and each round has 3 phases as following:
1.Placement of commanders: Commanders are actual executers who can deliver or perform your orders. Their roles are decided according to what place they put on.
2.Performing actions: Commanders on the board perform actions according to their places and roles. There are total 7 kinds of action according to 7 different places.
3.Enemy appearance and battle: Enemy fleets are emerging on the side of board and battle starts. There are 3 regions of sky(A,B,C) and battles can be happen on any region, sometimes multiple at the same time. Score evaluations are followed after each battle.

[Scoring]
After 8th round, sum up following scores:
- Current score(generally gained from battle)
- Fleet score
- Track & Commander score
- Mission card score

This is not a cooperative game, but you often need to cooperate with others at the battles for victory.
155585.name: Laputa

155586.description:
The railroad era of Korean history, the epic project to connect 8 provinces is begun. Many railroad companies are competing with each other to construct more trains and stations. Which company will be crowned the railway king!

[Goal]
Each player – the railroad company – should place his own trains as many as possible, construct stations properly, and connect the stations with the trains to get more points than other players.

[Game Play]

This game use 2 decks of common playing cards and a hex game board of South Korea map.




In one’s turn, do one action of two as follow.
1.Place trains: play cards from 1 to 7 pieces and place trains on the board corresponding to the cards. (The cards should be corresponded to adjacent areas on the board.)
2.Construct a station: play one card and place a station on the board corresponding to the card.
After the action 1, draw cards until you have 7 pieces in hand. After the action 2, draw a Joker card and take crossroad tokens – this is used as wild card in action 1.
Players get train points when they place trains and get extra points at the end of game according to their connection of stations and how large railway they made.

[Game ends and Scoring]
When a player places all his train, it is the final round. Continue turns till the last player. Players add the following scores to their current points: 1.Station link points and 2.The longest railway points.
155586.name: Tchu Tchu Train

155587.description:
Tree frog brothers are going home. However, they want to eat flies rather than to go home where the mother is waiting at. She will get angry and not give yummy supper if the brothers are too late. Therefore, go home before she puts away food! Of course, the frogs have to eat flies enough on the load. Eating is our instinct. ;)

[Goal]
Despite of mom's call, it's more important to eat flies than go home. Because we are tree frogs! But if you are too late, you'll get a scolding from mom. So be careful. Eat flies as many as possible and escape penalty points, and then win this game between brothers.

[Play - Brief Rules]
This is a dexterity game by flipping the paper(origami) frog.
On the game board, there are circle target and moving track. Each round the players flip own frog to the target, and move his tokens on the track according to the result of the target. Players should compete with each other to get more stone tiles which have points on the track. For this, flipping the frog to proper target area is very important. But it won’t be easy because the terrible event cards are opened frequently. Flip and go, and eat flies(points)!

[Game Ends & Scoring]
Game ends when one of the following situations is happened.
1. When any player's game token arrives at a home(Mom) space on the track.
2. When 'Mom card' is opened from Event Card deck.
In these cases, immediately game is over without the next round.
Scores are as follow: Fly points + 1.Home bonus points - 2.Penalty points for late (Depend on the above end situations.)
155587.name: Tree Frog

155588.description:
Explore Middle-earth and enjoy a grand adventure with Thorin Oakenshield and Company! The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey comes alive on your tabletop with this excellent line of HeroClix mini-figures based on the blockbuster film.

Special powers and Epic Abilities based off of the movie will enhance your HeroClix experience as Bilbo Baggins and Gandalf the Grey are joined by both friend and foe from the classic storyline from J.R.R. Tolkein's The Hobbit book.
The Hobbit An Unexpected Journey HeroClix Campaign Starter Set contains 7 exclusive figures, 48 Horde Tokens, 6 Maps, Epic-level Campaign scenarios, a 2012 HeroClix Rule book, a Powers and Abilities Card, Dice, Object tokens, and Terrain tokens offering a sneak-peek into the majesty and mystery of Middle-earth as seen in The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey feature film.

Play a scenario across a grid-based map with figures each with unique stats and abilities and defeat your opponents.
155588.name: HeroClix: The Hobbit – An Unexpected Journey

155589.name: Cosmos Trivia
155589.description:
Cosmos Trivia is a trivia game with 1380 easy and difficult questions. It contains 6 categories of questions: Culture, History, Sports, Sightseeings, Geography and General questions. Questions are applied to all the world's history, geography, etc.

It includes the following question types: multiple choice, enigma, rebus, tongue twisters and visual questions.

The game play includes moving around the board using a dice after each correctly answered question. At certain regions when a player or a team answers a question correctly, he aqcuires knowledge certificate for the corresponding categoty. The first player or team that collects all knowledge certificates wins the game.

Published ca. 2002-2005.

155590.description:
Hellas is the most complete trivia game regarding knowledge about Greece.

It's a trivia game with a variety of easy and difficult questions.

It includes 6 categories of questions: Culture, History, Sports, Linguistics, Geography, and General questions.

It has the following question types: multiple choice, enigma, rebus, tongue twisters, and visual questions.

All of them are regarding Greek History, Geography, etc.

Published ca. 2002-2005.
155590.name: Hellas

155591.name: Character Cards
155591.description:
From the Side of the Box:

A deck of playing cards, each with a detailed character, ready to drop into your games or stories. Contains 80 cards split into 4 suits (including knights), 22 major arcana and 2 jokers.

From the Back of the Box:

Each card contains a detailed and ready to use character. They can be combined to create nearly 3 billion combinations!


Their heart's desire - What they really want in life
Their occupation - What they do all day (or night)
Their physical nature - Appearance, strengths, weaknesses
Their social connections - Who they know who matters
Plot Hooks and Ideas - Something else that makes them interesting though it may not be well known

155592.name: Urban Locations
155592.description:
From the Side of the Box:

A deck of playing cards detailing fantasy location, ready to drop into your games or stories.

From the Back of the Box:

Fantasy cities contain thousands of amazing, and dangerous, places to stumble across; this deck details 55 of them for rapid, random, inspiration.


Five Facets - The structure, inhabitants, treasures, and defences found at that location; as well as its secret, something few know about it.
Roleplayers and Writers - Concept Cards are designed for all those who wish to build a believable story.
Playing Cards - In addition to detailing locations, this deck can be used to play any standard card game.
Expecting the Unexpected - When the tale takes a strange turn, you'll always be ready.
The Game Is On - Every card includes a value for all four suits, allowing for several unique card games. One is detailed within.

155593.name: Rural Locations
155593.description:
From the Side of the Box:

A deck of playing cards detailing fantasy location, ready to drop into your games or stories.

From the Back of the Box:

Your world contain thousands of amazing, and dangerous, places to stumble across; this deck details 55 of them for rapid, random, inspiration.


Five Facets - The structure, inhabitants, treasures, and defences found at that location; as well as its secret, something few know about it.
Roleplayers and Writers - Concept Cards are designed for all those who wish to build a believable story.
Playing Cards - In addition to detailing locations, this deck can be used to play any standard card game.
Expecting the Unexpected - When the tale takes a strange turn, you'll always be ready.
The Game Is On - Every card includes a value for all four suits, allowing for several unique card games. One is detailed within.

155594.name: Epic Locations
155594.description:
From the Side of the Box:

A deck of playing cards detailing fantasy location, ready to drop into your games or stories.

From the Back of the Box:

The worlds contain hundreds of fantastic places to visit; this deck details 56 of them for easy reference.


Five Facets - The structure, inhabitants, treasures, and defences found at that location; as well as its secret, something few know about it.
Roleplayers and Writers - Concept Cards are designed for all those who wish to spin a fantastic yarn.
Tarot Cards - In addition to generating random locations, this can be used to expand both the Urban and Rural Locations decks to full tarot decks.
Expecting the Unexpected - When the tale takes a strange turn, you'll always be ready.
The Game Is On - Every card includes a value for all four suits, allowing for several novel card games. One is detailed within.

155595.name: Mundus RPG
155595.description:
publisher blurb

Mundus RPG is an Asian themed fantasy tabletop RPG. Drawing inspiration from Japanese history, myths, anime and manga, Mundus RPG is played in the land of Tentaika - a realm filled with samurais, demons, political intrigue and epic adventure. The game system uses six-sided dice. The deep and interesting combat driven game system creates exciting and lethal challenges throughout all stages of gameplay.

Key features:

Diverse Character Creation
Build your character using the Life Module System or by point-buy system
Life Module System defines your character's childhood and upbringing creating a rich and interesting history
Endless different combinations for character creation to maximize the game's life cycle

Detailed and diverse Combat System
The detailed battle system offers satisfying gameplay from mundane samurai duels to epic anime style battles between powerful demigods
The Channeling System allows players to use diverse tactics in combat
Create your unique fighting style by combining various options from mystical arcane arts or spiritual power (Genki) to overpowering your enemies with pure samurai skills
The 5 second battle turns create a variety of options for each combat sequence

Awe-inspiring Land of Tentaika
8 prefectures, 5 casts, 3 planes, 10 Gods, several factions, one shogun
Pseudo-Japanese world with a system that supports all kinds of anime inspired gaming you can imagine
Ready made characters and monsters with rich backgrounds

PDF details:
416 pages in full color
Fully bookmarked
Beautiful art to inspire your campaigns

155596.name: Κυνήγι ερωτήσεων: Επιστήμες
155596.description:
A competitive game with 600 questions about Greece and the whole wold focusing on Science.

The game play is simple: Each player rolls the dice and according to the outcome of the dice he is being asked the corresponding question. If he answers right, he collects the card.

The player or the team with the most cards at the end of the game is the winner.

It belongs to a series of trivia games Κυνήγι Ερωτήσεων
1.History
2.Animals - Plants
3.Science
4.Culture
5.Sports
6.Geography
7.20th century
8.Greece

155597.name: Κυνήγι ερωτήσεων: Ζώα  –  Φυτά
155597.description:
A competitive game with 600 questions about Greece and the whole world focusing on Animals and Plants.

The game play is simple: Each player rolls the dice and according to the outcome of the dice he is being asked the corresponding question. If he answers right, he collects the card.

The player or the team with the most cards at the end of the game is the winner.

It belongs to a series of trivia games Κυνήγι Ερωτήσεων
1.History
2.Animals - Plants
3.Science
4.Culture
5.Sports
6.Geography
7.20th century
8.Greece

155598.name: Κυνήγι ερωτήσεων: Γράμματα – Τέχνες
155598.description:
A competitive game with 600 questions about Greece and the whole wold focusing on Culture.

The game play is simple: Each player rolls the dice and according to the outcome of the dice he is being asked the corresponding question. If he answers right, he collects the card.

The player or the team with the most cards at the end of the game is the winner.

It belongs to a series of trivia games Κυνήγι Ερωτήσεων
1.History
2.Animals - Plants
3.Science
4.Culture
5.Sports
6.Geography
7.20th century
8.Greece

155599.name: Κυνήγι ερωτήσεων: Αθλητισμός
155599.description:
A competitive game with 600 questions about Greece and the whole wold focusing on Sports.

The game play is simple: Each player rolls the dice and according to the outcome of the dice he is being asked the corresponding question. If he answers right, he collects the card.

The player or the team with the most cards at the end of the game is the winner.

It belongs to a series of trivia games Κυνήγι Ερωτήσεων
1.History
2.Animals - Plants
3.Science
4.Culture
5.Sports
6.Geography
7.20th century
8.Greece

155600.name: Κυνήγι ερωτήσεων: Γεωγραφία
155600.description:
A competitive game with 600 questions about Greece and the whole wold focusing on Geography.

The game play is simple: Each player rolls the dice and according to the outcome of the dice he is being asked the corresponding question. If he answers right, he collects the card.

The player or the team with the most cards at the end of the game is the winner.

It belongs to a series of trivia games Κυνήγι Ερωτήσεων
1.History
2.Animals - Plants
3.Science
4.Culture
5.Sports
6.Geography
7.20th century
8.Greece

155601.name: Κυνήγι ερωτήσεων: 20ος αιώνας
155601.description:
A competitive game with 600 questions about Greece and the whole wold focusing on the 20th century.

The game play is simple: Each player rolls the dice and according to the outcome of the dice he is being asked the corresponding question. If he answers right, he collects the card.

The player or the team with the most cards at the end of the game is the winner.

It belongs to a series of trivia games Κυνήγι Ερωτήσεων
1.History
2.Animals - Plants
3.Science
4.Culture
5.Sports
6.Geography
7.20th century
8.Greece

155602.description:
A competitive game with 600 questions about Greece and the whole world focusing on Greece.

The game play is simple: Each player rolls the dice and according to the outcome of the dice he is being asked the corresponding question. If he answers right, he collects the card.

The player or the team with the most cards at the end of the game is the winner.

It belongs to a series of trivia games Κυνήγι Ερωτήσεων
1.History
2.Animals - Plants
3.Science
4.Culture
5.Sports
6.Geography
7.20th century
8.Greece
155602.name: Κυνήγι ερωτήσεων: Ελλάδα

155603.name: Sector Nine (Tulmath Space)
155603.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Tulmath are the most peaceful of the six species, focusing more on trade than on anything else. They may want to dominate the other species economically, but they aren’t usually the type to go for military domination. Now you can learn about the planets they’ve colonized, the systems they struggle to try to control, and the systems that they hope will launch them deeper into space.

155604.name: Sector Twenty-One (Arbonix Space)
155604.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Arbonix are the only race in the Ephemeris RPG that can fly. They basically want peace, and the chance to colonize, but they’re ready for a fight when they need to be. Now you can learn about their sector of space. Learn about the planets they’ve colonized, the systems they battle to try to control, and the systems they’ve devoted to their religious need to find out about their origins.

155605.name: Sector Eight (Althani Space)
155605.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Althani are one of the most aggressive of the six major species in the Ephemeris universe. Now you can learn about their sector of space. Learn about the planets they’ve colonized, the systems they battle to try to control, and the systems that even they fear to enter.

155606.name: Sector Thirteen (Culthan Space)
155606.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Culthan are known as the mad race in the Ephemeris universe. Now you can learn about their sector of space. Learn about the planets they’ve colonized, the systems they battle to try to control, and the systems that even they fear to enter. You’ll also learn about just how far their madness has taken them, in good ways and bad ways.

155607.name: Poprock
155607.description:
From publisher blurb:

POPROCK!

Born of vengeance, the villain Poprock is part vigilante, part operative for the rogue science agency H.A.D.E.S.! Born with a power to infuse items with explosive energy and trained in martial arts, she's ready to take on the heroes of your city, while secretly trying to topple a criminal empire!

155608.name: Racial Guide 2.5: Halfbreeds and Hybrids
155608.description:
From publisher blurb:

Being a bastard never felt so good! In this book we've crammed in 30 new hybrid races! What happens when a aboleth and gillmen have a forbidden romance? How about a dromite and a rust monster? An elf and a dwarf? Well have no fear we've got all you want and some things you never wanted to know about (tiefling x flail snail?)! Also included are rules for making your own hybrids and is rounded our with feat support!

Included:

30 new specific hybrid races (stats, lore, plus starting age and weight/height)
Rules for making your own half-breeds.
29 new half-race specific feats
Original art from a whole slew of community artists!

155609.name: Perilous
155609.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Old World is gone, lost after an age of raging Chaos that laid the ancient civilizations low and changed the very surface of the planet. Now, a new world exists among the ruins of the old, a perilous world of monsters, mutants and magic, where the remnants of humanity and their allies fight for a new world in the midst of a savage land.

Welcome to Perilous!

Perilous is a game of fantastic adventure in a post-apocalyptic world of monsters, mutants and magic. In Perilous, you can take on the role of a character, an inhabitant of the Perilous Realms. As a player, you’ll create your character by selecting the character’s race and traits, determine their training and previous experience by choosing from dozens of skills and multiple realms of magic and get equipped from lists of arms, armor and general gear. Then step into a world of adventure!

Explore monster-haunted ruins and subterranean realms, search for lost wealth, magic and ancient technological artifacts, discover great wonders, encounter unimaginable horrors, fight for survival and battle for the future! All this and more await you within the Perilous Realms!

Or become the Hazard Master and control the monsters and dangers the characters will face. You’ll choose the adventure, determine the hazards, and select the actions that every monster takes.

Highlights include:

Characters


Create the character you want to play. No rolling and re-rolling. No clunky point systems. No spending hours creating a single character. Create a complete character in fifteen minutes or less.
Choose from nine traits, dozens of skills and multiple realms of magic.



Equipment


Equipment with mechanics. You’ll do more than just clutter your character sheet with all the stuff your character totes about. Whenever you use your gear, you’ll have the mechanics to make a real difference in the game.
Weapons with stats. More than just a damage die. Every weapons has its own set of stats that’ll give it its own role in combat.



Magic


A few have the ability to work magic, most do not. You’ll decide if your character has the power.
No memorization. No magic points. Magic is powerful, but has a price.



Action


Choose how much effort the character makes and take exactly the actions you want to take.
One rule to roll them all. Effort, action, reaction and saves, all come together in a simple, four-step, action resolution system that is used for all actions. If you can resolve one action, you can resolve them all.



Adventure


Fast setup and easy to play. No pages of lengthy background and descriptions. One glance at the map will tell you everything you need to know.
Highly reusable. Every adventure includes material you can reuse in future adventures and use to create adventures of your own.



Experience


Characters learn from their deeds. With every success comes experience.
Unlimited character development. Continue to create the character you want to play by developing the character how you choose.


Experience a game like no other. Enter the world of Perilous and enter new realms of adventure.

The Perilous rule book is fully bookmarked and packed with information on:

Characters
Equipment
Magic
Action and
Adventure!




Also included is a complete adventure, The Tunnels of Terror, a character sheet, two sheets of full-color counters representing doors and other features, and three full-color mapboards. Everything you need to enter a Perilous Realm of Fantastic Adventure!

155610.name: Death Fog
155610.description:
From publisher blurb:

An evening at the Golden Goblet turns deadly when two strangers come stumbling out of the night. Now, you and the other patrons at the inn must fight for your lives while chaos reigns around you. Can you survive the night or will you fall prey to what lurks within the fog?

"Death Fog" is the first sold-separately adventure for the Perilous Adventure Game. This product includes:

A Complete Adventure
Details of the Golden Goblet Inn
A New Monster
New Actions
A New Sheet of Full-Color Counters
Two New Full-Color Mapboards
And More!




Take the next step into the Perilous Realms with this terrifying night of adventure!

155611.name: Death Wind
155611.description:
From publisher blurb:

"Something lurks beneath Haunted Hill," the young man said, "and has begun feeding on the people of Stormburgh."

Bodies found drained of blood. A pale creature taking flight in the night. A hill of disturbing repute. All this and more await your characters when the mysterious woman in white awakes!

Continue the adventure begun in “Tunnels of Terror” and "Death Fog" with "Death Wind", the next exciting installment in the adventure series for the Perilous game. "Death Wind" is packed with new material, including:

A Complete Adventure
New Monsters
New Monster Abilities
A New Skill
New Treasure
And More!




Continue your journey into the Perilous Realms with this horrifying night of adventure!

155612.name: Death Knell
155612.description:
From publisher blurb:

The dead are rising. Each night, the tolling of a ghostly bell echoes through the town and the bodies of the recently dead rise to feast on the flesh of the living. Are you brave enough to seek out the source of this evil? Strong enough to overcome the perils that you will face? Or will you fall, only to rise again at the next death knell?

“Death Knell” is the climactic adventure begun in “Tunnels of Terror” and continued in "Death Fog" and “Death Wind”. “Death Knell” is packed with new material, including:

New Monsters
New Treasure
Monster Abilities
Actions
And More!




Continue your journey into the Perilous Realms with this horrifying night of adventure!

155613.description:
An amazing addition to the experience that Give It to the King! already brings to your table is a set of the custom designed resin figurines. This set of 5 figurines (4 messengers and the King!) is made from the original hand-crafted set, made by the Finish sculptor Mikko Pollari.

Each messenger and the King has a high level of detail which really gives each of them their own personality, look and feel.
155613.name: Give It To The King! Custom Resin Figurines

155614.name: XS Junior League Dodgeball
155614.description:
From the back of the North American PlayStation case:

You're it! But if you can catch the ball, then everyone else is YOUR target. The XS KIDS are a rowdy bunch. They come in all shapes, sizes, and skills.


Power-Ups and Downs in game play.
Use Magic Shots to increase your endurance or reduce your opponent's strength.
Choose from 8 different characters, male of female. The boys are strong and fast, the girls are quick and smart.
You can run, but you can't hide!

155616.name: Caverns of the Stone Giants
155616.description:
From the introduction:

Having dealt with an incursion of hill giants, the adventuring party now finds that stone giants are causing problems deep in the rocky mountains. The PCs have disturbed the plans of some evil faction, and as such the stone giants are now aggressively taking up the slack left by their defeated allies. They have begun blocking the main trading route through the mountains, demanding exorbitant tolls, and ransacking caravans. They threaten the flow of goods and information; they are building leverage over the rulers of the area.

155617.name: Frost Giant Fortress
155617.description:
From the introduction:

Dealing with the hill giants led to discovery that massive quantities of wood has been harvested and shipped north to the Frost Giants; and the stone giant lair revealed that massive quantities of iron ore were being mined, but not where it went. What plans do the giants have in mind regarding the wood and iron? Off to the far, frigid north it is for the PCs!

155618.name: Fire Giant Forge
155618.description:
From the introduction:

Events in the frost giant dungeons led to the discovery that the fire giants were controlling the frost giants. Working together, the giants had amassed a fleet of ships to use in blockading ports and shipping lanes, and to wage piracy on the small people with.

155619.name: Cloud Giant Castle
155619.description:
From the introduction:

In brief, the giants were defeated, their plans to conquer the lands of the small folk crushed by intrepid adventurers. Even support from a strange race of dark elves could not save them.
And yet, peace has not returned to the lands. Not that it was ever really peaceful, but there are rumors and events indicating that the threat is not over.

155620.name: XS Moto
155620.description:
From the back of the English/European PlayStation case:

Life in the Fast Lane!


12 circuits from around the world plus 10 bonus circuits to be unlocked
Enhanced physics and gameplay on higher levels
23 computer opponents all with fully animated riders
Progressive championship mode over 4 countries
2 play split screen
Skill tests for play progression

155621.name: Arkis Vir - Conquer the Galaxy
155621.description:
UNRELEASED GAME - CANCELLED




This game was cancelled in development. Please only submit images if you own a copy or have legal access to this item.




Arkis Vir contains a mix of traditional turn-based strategy mechanics, and Euro mechanics, to bring you fast-paced yet in-depth matches that can be finished in one sitting.


Build your fleet with our 8 unique styles of ships
Unlock ship modifications that let you fine-tune your ship's * strengths and weaknesses
Build powerful "Command Ships" that grant passive bonuses, and a powerful "Zenith" ability
Choose whether you want to conquer planets, or let them barter for freedom
Fight for control of randomly spawned rebel forces
Engage in political diplomacy with other players
Choose which "Tactical Actions" and "Strategic Actions" you will play throughout the game to keep your opponents at bay
Discover the deep diplomatic connections and rich history of every planet in Arkis Vir


Arkis Vir aims to bring the playing field to life by allowing you to make strategic decisions about how to handle planetary inhabitants and rebel forces throughout the game. Each decision you make will either reward you or destroy you later on, so choose wisely!

Source: The Game Website.

155622.name: Rapid Angel
155622.description:
Rapid Angel

Japanese developer Techo Soleil had a knack for creating games with sophisticated charm and nuance. Rapid Angel fits the mold.

This combination beat-em up and platformer has something special for those with a subtle eye for Japanese ingenuity. The graphics are very stylish and well-crafted. The game play goes back to the old days of running, jumping and fighting, picking up gems and coins for points and food to replenish your life. You can choose between three anime girls to be your heroine, each with her own fighting style.

This combination beat-em up and platformer has something special for those with a subtle eye for Japanese ingenuity. The graphics are very stylish and well-crafted. The game play goes back to the old days of running, jumping and fighting, picking up gems and coins for points and food to replenish your life. You can choose between three anime girls to be your heroine, each with her own fighting style.

This combination beat-em up and platformer has something special for those with a subtle eye for Japanese ingenuity. The graphics are very stylish and well-crafted. The game play goes back to the old days of running, jumping and fighting, picking up gems and coins for points and food to replenish your life. You can choose between three anime girls to be your heroine, each with her own fighting style.

Source: The Publisher Website.

155623.name: Monster Bass!
155623.description:
User Summary

Monster Bass! is a fishing simulator that challenges you to catch scientifically mutated gigantic monster bass. The game includes four different locations to go fishing. As the game progresses you can unlock new baits and tricks.

boardgamehonor.34511: 2015 Golden Geek Best Thematic Board Game Nominee

155624.description:
A secret agent of A.R.K. has infiltrated a top secret Raxxon facility, attempting to complete three mission objectives before they escape — but they are hunted by genetically modified Raxxon Hunters. Players can choose which side they wish to join.

Specter Ops is a sci-fi, stealth ops game of hidden movement that's similar to Scotland Yard. Players are trying to locate/capture a mysterious agent, who keeps track of their sneaking via a private map. The other players take control of unique characters who must use their wits, abilities and technology to help them hunt down this infiltrator. Items like flash grenades, scanners, and the like are at the disposal of this covert agent.
155624.name: Specter Ops

155625.name: Campaign Module 1: Borderlands of Adventure
155625.description:
From publisher blurb:

Ten years ago, the borderlands fell. A horde of humanoids poured out of the wilderness and rampaged across the region, destroying fortifications, settlements and anyone that stood in its path. The horde was eventually broken by armies from the settled lands, but the borderlands have remained unsettled. Now, rumors have begun circulating of humanoids and bandits attacking travelers and merchants, raiding isolated farmsteads and small communities, and carrying captives and loot back to their lairs in the borderlands. There are older tales, too, of ruins in the borderlands, mist-shrouded and monster-haunted, where treasure yet lies.

You and your companions have gathered at a tavern in a nearby settlement, to plan an expedition into the borderlands. The journey is sure to be fraught with peril. Monsters and bands of marauders are said to roam the region. And who knows what creatures and foul beings may have crept into the hills and dark forests since the area was overrun. The dangers may be great, but wealth and glory await those brave enough to seek it out and bold enough to seize it.

Borderlands of Adventure is a Campaign Module for Labyrinth Lord and similar classic fantasy adventure games. Suitable for characters of 1st to 3rd level, the module includes Background, Rumors and Start sections, a wilderness adventure map, encounter tables, wilderness encounters, and ruins, caverns and dungeons, each mapped and keyed and waiting to come to life at your gaming table.

155626.name: Dungeon Module 1: The Secret of Eberon's Manor
155626.description:
From publisher blurb:

Ten years ago Eberon’s Manor burned. The stately old house in the woods had been overrun by a band of humanoids, pillaged and burned. What became of the people and wealth believed to be housed within the manor is not known. Most assume that what was not destroyed was carried off to the marauder’s lair. Rumors still circulate, though, that a series of halls and chambers lie beneath the manor. What wealth, wonders or horrors may be found there is not known. Those that have set out to investigate the manor never returned to tell their tale. Will you and your companions uncover the secret of Eberon’s Manor, or will you too vanish beneath the ruins?

The Secret of Eberon’s Manor is a Dungeon Module for characters of 1st to 3rd level for Labyrinth Lord and similar classic fantasy adventure games. The module includes Background and Start information, rumors, maps and encounters. The adventure site can be used independently or as part of CM1 Borderlands of Adventure Campaign Module, available now.

155627.name: Dungeon Module 2: The Dungeons of Diremirk
155627.description:
From publisher blurb:

An ancient evil unearthed.

A centuries-old mystery.

A new threat rising.

"Diremirk," he whispered, just before he collapsed, a haggard and feverish man who came stumbling out of the night. The lone survivor of a doomed expedition tells a tale of dread and darkness, of things half-glimpsed in the ruddy light, of companions dragged off into the blackness. Something monstrous lurks beneath the Ruins of Diremirk. An ancient evil unearthed or a new threat rising? You’ll have an opportunity to find out, if you’re brave enough to enter the Dungeons of Diremirk.

The Dungeons of Diremirk is a Dungeon Module for characters of 2nd to 4th level for Labyrinth Lord and similar classic fantasy adventure games. The adventure pits the characters against the dangers of a marshland ruin and a centuries-old mystery. The module includes Background and Start information, rumors, three maps and over sixty encounters. The adventure site can be used independently or as part of CM1 Borderlands of Adventure Campaign Module, available now. Also available, DM1 The Secret of Eberon’s Manor.

155628.name: Universal Adventures Dungeon Deck
155628.description:
From publisher blurb:

You’ve Got the Rules. Now Get the Game.

Universal Adventures Dungeon Deck is a set of cards that allows you to create a dungeon for any fantasy adventure role-playing game, area by area, while you play. Each of the 54 cards in this set includes the title and description of the area, a map, any special rules or modifiers, and the chance for an encounter or event to occur in the area. With these cards, an objective, and a list of possible encounters and events, you can play any fantasy adventure role-playing game, solo or with a group, with or without a Game Master. With Universal Adventures Dungeon Deck you’ll always have a way to play your fantasy adventure role-playing games.

With Universal Adventures Dungeon Deck you get:

How to read the cards,
Detailed descriptions of each of the special modifiers,
Tips on preparing for an adventure,
How to prepare a Dungeon deck for your adventure,
How to use the cards in play,
Advanced options,
and 54 Dungeon cards.




Universal Adventures Dungeon Deck is the first in the Universal Adventures series of products from New Realms Publishing. With Universal Adventures products, you’ll be able to create an adventure for any fantasy adventure role-playing game, while you play.

155629.name: Universal Adventures Critical Hits
155629.description:
From publisher blurb:

Add some excitement and detail to your battles with Universal Adventures Critical Hits!

The ultimate combat accessory for any fantasy role-playing game, Universal Adventures Critical Hits provides you with a set of six tables for determining critical damage for crushing, piercing, slashing, fire, ice and electricity attacks. Whenever an attack scores a critical, or anytime you want to add something extra to the damage, a single die roll on the table matching the damage type gives you the hit location and result of the damage. Suitable for any game system, Universal Adventures Critical Hits provides you with detailed damage results without slowing down your game. From glancing blows to scorching blasts, cuts, punctures and broken bones, Universal Adventures Critical Hits can make even the dullest battle dangerous and exciting.

155630.name: Universal Adventures Custom Encounters
155630.description:
From publisher blurb:

Who knows what horrors lurk within the Misty Hall, what lies in the depths of the Murky Pool, or what creeps across the Fungi Chamber? You will when you buy Universal Adventures Custom Encounters!

Universal Adventures Custom Encounters is a set of six custom, nine-card decks for use in your Universal Adventures Dungeon Deck games. These decks provide unique results for Encounter and Secret Compartment checks for the Murky Pool, Misty Hall, Pillared Hall, Serpent Statue, Dwarf Statue, and Fungi Chamber areas. With these cards you won’t need to make an Encounter check when your characters enter the Misty Hall, Murky Pool, Pillared Hall or Fungi Chamber, just draw the top card from the matching deck and discover what happens. Similarly, if a character searches the statue in the Serpent Statue or Dwarf Statue area, all you have to do is draw a card from the corresponding deck. Add more depth, detail and variety to your Dungeon Deck games with Universal Adventures Custom Encounters.

Universal Adventures Custom Encounters is the second installment in the Universal Adventures series of products and requires the Universal Adventures Dungeon Deck for complete use. With Universal Adventures products, you’ll be able to create an adventure for any fantasy adventure role-playing game, while you play.

155631.name: Lass dich nicht foppen!
155631.description:
Each player gets 3 meeples, which he has to get across the board to his finish spaces, which are also the starting spaces of another player. In his turn each player can move 1 meeple 1 space in any direction. No meeple can jump over another, so they get blocked a lot. The colored spaces on the game board may only be occupied by meeples of the same color. The first player to get all 3 meeples to the finish spaces, wins the game.

The game was likely published in the 1930s.

155632.name: Universal Adventures Hall of the Ogre Lord
155632.description:
From publisher blurb:

The ancient dwarf hold fell long ago. For decades, rumors of lurking monsters and hidden chambers of lost treasure within the halls have circulated through the taprooms of inns and taverns. More recently, however, other rumors of the halls are being whispered. Tales of humanoid raiders bearing the symbol of the bloody skull are being told. And there are darker tales. Tales of a bandit lord, a great ogre, that commands the raiders and rules the halls.

Explore the halls, search for lost treasure and battle the forces of the Ogre Lord with Universal Adventures Hall of the Ogre Lord. Universal Adventures Hall of the Ogre Lord includes 18 Encounter Cards, 18 Event Cards, 9 Treasure Cards and 9 Search Cards. With the cards you can generate encounters, events, treasure and the results of search actions as adventurers explore the halls or any other adventure you care to use the cards with. For use with any fantasy adventure rpg, Hall of the Ogre Lord can be used independently or in conjunction with other Universal Adventures products. Use the Dungeon Deck to create the halls or use a map of your own. With Universal Adventures products you’ll always have a way to play your favorite fantasy rpg’s.

160598.name: Zombies Keep Out: Night of the Noxious Dead

155633.description:
It's bodge or get bitten in Zombies Keep Out when a giant mob of zombies attacks the goblins' workshop. Now it's up to you and the other bodgers to repel the undead or become a zombie's late-night snack!

Barricaded in your workshop, you and your goblin cohorts must rely on your mechanical expertise to construct the sometimes ramshackle but always maniacal machines you'll need to overcome the endless Leapers, Creepers, Runners, and Brutes trying to break down your doors. Collect parts to build your machines as fast as you can, but don't get bitten — or else you'll be left moaning and groaning as you join the horde and turn on your friends!

Zombies Keep Out is a fully cooperative board game for 1–6 players.
155633.name: Zombies Keep Out

155634.name: Universal Adventures Encounter Deck
155634.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Universal Adventures Encounter Deck is a set of 54 encounter cards for use with any fantasy adventure game. Each card includes a title, description, and encounter information. From Giant Bats and Rats, to Rock Scorpions and Undead Ogres, the Encounter Deck includes a wide range of opponents for your fantasy adventure games. Also included are encounters with other adventurers and opportunities to launch additional adventures. With the Universal Adventures Encounter Deck, you never need to be unprepared for a gaming session again. Just select the cards you want to include in the upcoming adventure, shuffle the deck, and whenever the characters have an encounter, draw the top card from the Encounter Deck to determine what the encounter is.

The cards can also be used for solo or group games without a Game Master, to fill in the unkeyed areas of a dungeon while you play, to generate wandering monsters and more. Combine the Encounter Deck with the [Universal Adventures Dungeon Deck] and you can create an adventure, complete with encounters, for any fantasy adventure role-playing game, while you play.

155635.name: The Play's The Thing (Magpie)
155635.description:
User summary
This revised and expanded edition of Mark's submission to the 2011 Game Chef contest was crowdfunded on Kickstarter and published in February 2012.

Publisher blurb

The Play’s The Thing is a storytelling game about actors who want to rewrite the Shakespearean roles they’ve been given.

You and your friends tell the story of an acting troupe that is scheduled to perform a new play, but has a lot of disagreements about how that play should go. While the Playwright might present you with a classic Shakespearean folio, you’ll use your imagination and wit to craft new events and excitement in old stories.

Imagine:

If Ophelia never drowned…and killed Claudius herself.

If Romeo never met Juliet…but fell in love with Mercutio.

If Othello figured out that Iago was to blame…or secretly plotted to kill him first.

In The Play’s The Thing, one player takes on the role of the Playwright, the writer and director of the Play, and the rest of you portray Actors (Hams, Leads, Villains, and Ingenues) who are cast in roles. As you work your way through the Acts of the Play, you’ll suggest changes that the Playwright has to incorporate into the work, making The Bard’s stories even better.

155636.description:
The year is 2020. The world hovers on the brink of annihilation. Preceded by a devastating orbital attack, a warlike alien race known as the Hydra has besieged the planet, their invasion force carried on enormous drop ships that dwarf city blocks and rain devastation from above. The Hydra’s ultimate goal is to eradicate the last survivors of their ancient nemesis, the Ghin, an alien race that has taken refuge on Earth. Humanity is caught in the apocalyptic crossfire. As widespread panic grips the populace, governments topple, economies crumble, and order dissolves. In these desperate days, mankind’s only hope lies with the Ghin and one of their most brilliant minds: Dr. Cronos, a being as guilty of atrocities against humanity as those who hunt him.

LEVEL 7 [INVASION] is a standalone semi-cooperative game of global strategy set in the LEVEL 7 universe that follows the events of LEVEL 7 [ESCAPE], LEVEL 7 [ESCAPE]: Lockdown, and LEVEL 7 [OMEGA PROTOCOL]. As the planet is battered by the Hydra's relentless assault, you'll control Earth's desperation-forged coalitions in an effort to turn back the invasion. But soldiers aren't enough. You and your allies must manage your resources carefully to combat the threats of hysteria, famine, and population loss as well. Endure long enough, and you might buy the time for Dr. Cronos to develop the advanced weaponry required to defeat the invading Hydra. The survival of the human race depends on your next move!
155636.name: Level 7 [Invasion]

155638.name: Universal Adventures Dungeon Deck II
155638.description:
From publisher blurb:

Fifty-four more cards for your dungeon delving delight!

Universal Adventures Dungeon Deck II is a set of fifty-four Dungeon cards for your fantasy adventure games. Use the cards to flesh out parts of your own dungeon, create a dungeon before play, create a dungeon while you play, or as inspiration for your own adventures. Each of these cards includes a title, description, map, any special rules or modifiers, and the chance of any encounters and events. This set includes temples, sloping corridors, prisons, alchemist’s labs, new special modifiers, and more! Design new dungeons with this new addition to the Universal Adventures product line.

Requires the Universal Adventures Dungeon Deck for complete use.

155639.name: Universal Adventures Event Deck
155639.description:
From publisher blurb:

Fifty-four events for your fantasy adventure games!

Universal Adventures Event Deck is a set of fifty-four cards for use with any fantasy adventure game. Each card describes an event which could occur during a dungeon adventure. Events include monsters, encounters with other characters, traps, strange occurrences and more. With the Universal Adventures Event Deck, you’ll always have a set of surprises for your next gaming session. Just select the cards you want to include in the upcoming adventure, shuffle the deck, and whenever an event occurs, draw the top card from the Event deck to see what happens.

The cards can be used for solo or group games, with, or without, a Game Master. Combine the Event Deck with other Universal Adventures products and you can create an adventure, complete with encounters and a dungeon setting, for any fantasy adventure role-playing game, while you play.

155640.name: Universal Adventures Search Deck
155640.description:
From publisher blurb:

For the times when you don’t know what your characters might find.

Monsters, secret compartments, treasure and more await the brave adventurer within the Universal Adventures Search Deck. Universal Adventures Search Deck is a set of fifty-four cards for use with any fantasy adventure game. Each of the cards provides the result of a search of a dungeon area, such as a room, chamber or corridor. If a character searches a dungeon area and you are not sure what they might find, draw a card from the Search deck and find out. The cards range from encounters with monsters and traps, to treasure, weapons, armor, equipment, secret compartments and more. Most of the cards list six possible results, adding even more variety to the outcome. The Search cards can be used independently or in conjunction with other Universal Adventures products. Use them in solo games or group games without a Game Master. As a Game Master use them to fill in details for portions of your own adventures or in any other way you see fit. With Universal Adventures products, you’ll always have the tools to play your games, your way.

155641.name: Universal Adventures Treasure Deck
155641.description:
From publisher blurb:

Fifty-four treasure cards for your fantasy adventure games!

Universal Adventures Treasure Deck is a set of fifty-four cards for use with any fantasy adventure game. Each of the cards details an item of treasure the characters might discover during the course of an adventure. If the characters discover treasure, such as after an encounter or as the result of a search, and you are not sure what they find, draw a card from the Treasure deck and find out. Discover Exterminus, the Circlet of Memory, potions, wands, scrolls and more! The Treasure cards can be used independently or in conjunction with other Universal Adventures products. Use them in solo games or in group games, with or without a Game Master. As a Game Master, use the cards to generate treasure for random encounters or for sections of your own adventures. With Universal Adventures products, you’ll always have the tools to play your games, your way.

155642.name: Universal Adventures Darkness Under Glimmerdale
155642.description:
From publisher blurb:

Dark times have come to Glimmerdale. The Glimmerill runs foul and people are falling ill. The apparent source, the effluence from a tunnel that drains into a secluded cove along the Glimmerill. The residents of Glimmerdale need help. And that’s just the beginning.

Darkness Under Glimmerdale is the first scenario pack in the Universal Adventures product line and includes six adventures, nine Encounter cards, nine Event cards and nine Dungeon cards, for use with any fantasy roleplaying game. Each adventure includes Background, Objective and Start information and lists of the Dungeon, Encounter and Event cards which comprise the adventure. A storyline links the adventures together and many of the elements introduced can be included in an ongoing campaign. The cards are reusable and can be used in future adventures.

Use the adventures for solo or group games without a Game Master, with a Game Master, or as the core concepts for your own campaign. Like all Universal Adventures products, these adventures can be played with any fantasy adventure rules. With Universal Adventures Scenario Packs, you’ll always have adventures to play with your favorite fantasy roleplaying games.

For complete use, Universal Adventures Darkness Under Glimmerdale requires the Universal Adventures Dungeon Deck, Encounter Deck and Event Deck.

155643.description:
Prepare yourself for a new weapon in the ongoing fight to keep the streets of Arkham safe!

The Arkham Horror "Blessed" Dice Set contains five high-quality, crafted, polyhedral blue dice for use in Arkham Horror. They are cast from hand-carved original sculpts, and feature ornately detailed faces as well as Elder signs on the "4," "5," and "6" sides to indicate successes.
155643.name: Arkham Horror: Blessed Dice Set

155644.name: Universal Adventures Bastion of Chaos
155644.description:
From publisher blurb:

Fifty-four cards of Chaos for your Fantasy Adventure Games!

Explore the Crypt, brave the deadly Slime Pit, battle the dreaded Dredoc and more, with this set of Dungeon and Encounter cards for your fantasy adventure games. Universal Adventures Bastion of Chaos is a set of fifty-four Dungeon and Encounter cards focusing on the forces of Chaos. The set includes nine Dungeon cards, eighteen Encounter cards, nine Slime Pit cards, nine Crypt cards and nine Chaos Gate cards. The cards can be used to generate dungeon areas and encounters for any fantasy adventure game, before your game, or while you play. Add the forces of Chaos to your games. These cards can be used independently or in conjunction with other decks from the Universal Adventures product line.

155645.description:
Prepare yourself for a new weapon in the ongoing fight to keep the streets of Arkham safe!

The Arkham Horror "Cursed" Dice Set contains five high-quality, crafted, polyhedral red dice for use in Arkham Horror. They are cast from hand-carved original sculpts, and feature ornately detailed faces as well as Elder signs on the "6" side to indicate a success.
155645.name: Arkham Horror: Cursed Dice Set

155646.name: Universal Adventures Wilderness Deck
155646.description:
From publisher blurb:

Monsters, Magic, Mayhem and More! Enjoy the great outdoors and enhance your fantasy adventure games with this newest edition to the Universal Adventures product line.

Universal Adventures Wilderness Deck is a set of fifty-four cards for use with any fantasy adventure game. Each card describes an encounter or event that could occur as your characters travel through the great outdoors. Encounter obstacles, such as lakes and gorges, magical events, monsters, ruins and more! Many of the cards could serve as launching points for new adventures and there are numerous NPC’s for your characters to interact with. Bring new surprises, action, adventure and excitement to your wilderness adventures with the Universal Adventures Wilderness Deck!

An entire campaign of adventure awaits with Universal Adventures! Combine the Wilderness Deck with other products from the Universal Adventures product line and create an entire campaign, while you play! Explore the wilderness, create dungeons, encounters, treasure, and more! With Universal Adventures, a world of adventure awaits each time you play!

155647.name: Universal Adventures Deadly Foes
155647.description:
From publisher blurb:

Dragons, giants and deadly monsters from the deepest dungeons!

For deeper dungeons and more dangerous environments, Universal Adventures Deadly Foes brings you 27 Encounter cards and 27 Event cards for use with any fantasy adventure game. Each Encounter card includes a title, description, and encounter information. Each Event card describes an encounter, trap or strange happening that could occur during your fantasy adventure games.

Quickly and easily determine encounters and events for your fantasy role-playing games with Universal Adventures Encounter and Event cards. Just select the cards you want to include in the upcoming adventure, shuffle and whenever an encounter or event occurs, just draw the top card from the deck to see what happens. Great for solo or group games without a GM. As a GM, never be unprepared again. You’ll always be ready to game with Universal Adventures cards and game aids.
